value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|The inner sanctum... We've arrived.
See the runes inscribed on the wall?
That's the ancient language of Nifl.$k$p"Here does our god slumber. Nifl, the
dragon of ice..."$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|I hate to interrupt the history lesson,
but we've got some problems that are
a bit more...contemporary.$k$pHere comes the enemy. Get ready to
fight!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_AMB_USERNAME,0|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Nifl, god of ice, hear me... It is your
child, Fjorm, who bows in prayer...$k$pAs an offering, I bring you my flesh.
As the vessel, I bring you a divine
weapon...$k$pOne that has come a great distance
and has the power to rule all worlds.$k$pI beg you, hear my prayer. We seek
the strength to tame the savage
flame.$k$pWe seek to quench the
unquenchable, to kill the undying.$k$pFill this vessel with your power...$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$EFace_Pain|Ah!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Whoa! What's this? Breidablik... It
looks as though it's frozen over. Will
it work like this?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Don't worry. The ritual imbues the
weapon with the power of ice.$k$pThis means that we have successfully
completed the Rite of Frost.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Does this mean that we are finally
prepared to defeat Surtr?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Yes. The next time we face him, the
divine weapon will counteract the
power which protects him.$k$p$EFace_Pain|That means... *cough*$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Princess Fjorm? Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|My apologies... The altar was so cold,
and I had to hold fast to it during the
ritual...$k$pPerhaps I've caught a cold.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I never thought I'd hear you say that!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|My apologies... *cough* I know it's
just one more thing to worry about.$k$pLet's return to a more important
matter... The power granted by the
Rite of Frost cancels Surtr's defenses.$k$pFinally, we can fight him how we'd
fight any opponent...and he will meet
his end.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|There we go! Surtr, your days are
numbered!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I will defeat him myself. And his death
will not be an easy one.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|When it comes to Surtr, your whole
demeanor changes...$k$p$EFace_Cool|All right, everyone! Gather your
belongings, and don't forget your
courage!$k$pThe final battle against Surtr
approaches!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Xander...$k$pI order you. Escape...now.$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|That...is the one order...that I must
refuse...Princess Veronica.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Xander...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha-hah-hah! Would you taste more of
my flames, young warrior?$k$pPerhaps, then, rather than your arm...
I ought to target your head?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait!$k$pI'll...go to Múspell... So, please...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I believe understanding may have
dawned on you, my dear. You see
how things are now, don't you?$k$pYou must see now how earnest we
are. As I always say...a little bit of
sincerity goes a long way.$k$pAs for you, Prince Xander... You look
like you're all worn out. Why don't
you just rest here for a while?$k$pIt's not just your health I'm worried
about. The princess will fare much
better, too...$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|Tch...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Now, my dear, follow me... Quietly.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|What a waste of time. Spoiled child.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah—aaaagh!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Did you think you could stand up to
me? A king?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Sur...tr...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|My, my. Your highness, I think you
ought to stop. I'm not sure she can
withstand much more of this.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Now, Princess Veronica. Just come
along quietly like the sweet little lamb
I know you are.$k$pAfter all, the king himself has extended
his warmest invitation to you. Aren't
you excited to see Múspell?$k$pThe Kingdom of Flame requires an
offering. The king himself will cast you
into the fire. Sorry, my dear!$k$p$Sbs150|
